title: SLBCs can play effective role in financial inclusion by better coordination with govt, NGOs: RBI DG
description: RBI Deputy Governor Swaminathan J emphasized the crucial role of State Level Bankers' Committees (SLBCs) in advancing financial inclusion. He highlighted their potential for better coordination with governments and NGOs, effective credit planning, and promoting digital financial literacy. Swaminathan urged SLBCs to bridge the gap between financial services and underserved communities, fostering inclusive and sustainable economic growth.
